title: Retirement Advisor: How MassMutual’s First Responders Handled The Crisis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: MassMutual’s Bob Carroll offers a front-row view of his firm’s response to the coronavirus crisis, with regard to retirement savers and advisors managing workplace plans. In the interview (20:32), Carroll shares a touching story of how the crisis brought competing advisors together to help their community. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
